metadata.title: Jurassic World Electric Toothbrush and Fluoride Toothpaste Set for Kids (Blue)
description: Your dinosaur fan will love this Jurassic World toothbrush and toothpaste set. As your kids grow up, their oral care needs change. So what better way to transition them to fluoride toothpaste than brushing with Jurassic World Fluoride Toothpaste. The Jurassic World Spinbrush toothbrush has small soft bristles for smaller mouths. Itâ€™s also ergonomically designed to fit little hands perfectly.
